title: 高考英语高频难词突破训练
description: 精选30个高考英语高级词汇，旨在提升词汇运用能力与语境理解水平。

questions.sentence: The scientist noticed a strange p_________ in the atmosphere during the experiment.
questions.translation: 科学家在实验过程中注意到了大气中一种奇怪的现象。

questions.sentence: She has a very o_________ attitude towards life, always expecting the best.
questions.translation: 她对生活持有一种非常乐观的态度，总是期待最好的结果。

questions.sentence: It is important to a_________ enough capital before starting your own business.
questions.translation: 在创业之前积累足够的资金是很重要的。

questions.sentence: The hotel provides excellent a____________ for tourists visiting the city.
questions.translation: 这家酒店为造访这座城市的游客提供了极好的住宿。

questions.sentence: We need to make a c____________ effort to solve this environmental issue.
questions.translation: 我们需要齐心协力来解决这个环境问题。

questions.sentence: His c___________ to the charity helped many poor children go to school.
questions.translation: 他对慈善机构的捐助帮助了许多贫困儿童上学。

questions.sentence: The twins are so alike that it is difficult to d__________ between them.
questions.translation: 这对双胞胎长得太像了，很难区分他们。

questions.sentence: Regular exercise is f__________ to maintaining good health.
questions.translation: 经常锻炼对于保持健康是至关重要的。

questions.sentence: I cannot g________ that the weather will be fine for the picnic tomorrow.
questions.translation: 我不能保证明天的野餐会有好天气。

questions.sentence: The audience was e___________ about the band's performance and cheered loudly.
questions.translation: 观众对乐队的表演充满热情，大声欢呼。

questions.sentence: Under no c___________ should you leave the laboratory unlocked.
questions.translation: 在任何情况下，你都不应该不锁实验室的门。

questions.sentence: The company is looking for a r_____________ to handle customer complaints.
questions.translation: 公司正在寻找一名代表来处理客户投诉。

questions.sentence: He expressed his deep a___________ for all the help he had received.
questions.translation: 他对收到的所有帮助表达了深深的感激之情。

questions.sentence: This detailed map will be of t_________ help to us during our journey.
questions.translation: 这张详细的地图将在我们的旅途中提供巨大的帮助。

questions.sentence: She is a s____________ lady who enjoys classical music and fine art.
questions.translation: 她是一位富有修养的女士，喜欢古典音乐和美术。

questions.sentence: The police are conducting a thorough i____________ into the cause of the fire.
questions.translation: 警方正在对火灾起因进行彻底调查。

questions.sentence: It is a c_____________ that you arrived just as I was leaving.
questions.translation: 真巧，你刚到我就要走了。

questions.sentence: We should respect the cultural d________ of different nations.
questions.translation: 我们应该尊重不同国家的文化多样性。

questions.sentence: The government has implemented a new policy to boost the e______.
questions.translation: 政府实施了一项新政策以促进经济发展。

questions.sentence: Lack of sleep can have a negative p____________ effect on your mind.
questions.translation: 睡眠不足会对你的精神产生负面的心理影响。

questions.sentence: Please make sure your behavior is a__________ for a formal occasion.
questions.translation: 请确保你的举止适合正式场合。

questions.sentence: The c__________ of ignoring the traffic rules can be very serious.
questions.translation: 无视交通规则的后果可能会非常严重。

questions.sentence: She has all the necessary q_____________ to become a good teacher.
questions.translation: 她具备成为一名好老师所需的所有资格。

questions.sentence: We need to find an a__________ way to solve this complex math problem.
questions.translation: 我们需要找到另一种方法来解决这道复杂的数学题。

questions.sentence: The museum is famous for its collection of c___________ art.
questions.translation: 这家博物馆以其当代艺术收藏而闻名。

questions.sentence: Honesty is a distinct c_____________ of his personality.
questions.translation: 诚实是他性格中一个显著的特征。

questions.sentence: The discovery of electricity is of great s___________ to human history.
questions.translation: 电的发现对人类历史具有重大意义。

questions.sentence: He nodded his head in a______________ of the instructions given.
questions.translation: 他点头表示确认收到了指令。

questions.sentence: We must fight against racial p________ and treat everyone equally.
questions.translation: 我们必须反对种族偏见，平等对待每一个人。

questions.sentence: The journey from the airport to the hotel takes a____________ one hour.
questions.translation: 从机场到酒店大约需要一个小时。
